message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering its value and uniqueness. What do you think?
I appreciate the enthusiasm, Alice, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand that $12000 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $11000, which is a significant discount from the original price. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but $11000 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand that $11000 is still a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another concession. I can do $10500, which is a very competitive price for this product. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $10500 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $8500. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $9250?
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob! I can do $9800, which is a very good compromise. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $10500. What do you think?
I think we're getting close, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $9250. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $9375?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can do $9400, which is very close to your offer. I'm not willing to go any lower, but I think this is a fair compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $9375. I'll pay $9250 for the product. This is my final offer.
